name: Demolition Debbie (or Debs?) Prototype
description:
This is a prototype sonic-style platformer with some ideas taken from Pizza tower, featuring a gay punk armadillo.

There is only one level, the tutorial map. There's a goal ring but it doesn't do anything, so you only get the satisfaction of reaching it.

CONTROLS:

Move - Arrow Keys

Jump - A

"Trick" - S

Special Moves:

Ball Form- If you hold down the armadillo will curl into a ball. He picks up speed faster on slopes while a ball.

Mach Speed- If you go fast enough you can smash certain blocks.

Mach Turn- If you press the trick button and the opposite direction to your movement, while at mach speed, you will enter a slide that redirects your speed in a different direction.

Drill Dive- Press Down and Trick while airborne. The armadillo will dive directly downward at high speed. If you are on a slope can be redirected into horizontal speed.

Notes:

- The armadillo should fall off of walls when he's too slow, but that's not implemented yet. I want to refactor the code first.

- The armadillo has trouble sticking to convex-downward slopes.
